            [color=blue]##[/color] [color=red][size=2][b]????????[/b][/color][/size] : [b]Work beside Grissom, Catherine, and the rest of the CSI cast. Collect and analyze evidence with the latest crime-solving equipment. Put your skills to the test to link the suspect, crime scene, and victim. Only then can you make an arrest and crack the case. 
CSI: 3 Dimensions of Murder is the first CSI game developed by Telltale. It\&#039;s also the first game in the series to make the leap into 3D, bringing you even closer to the gritty world of crime scene investigation.  [/b]
